item.title: Innovatec S.P.A.
item.description: Economics **and** **business organization** project concerning the analysis of a company's history, governance, business model and budget

item.title: Laureandosi
item.description: **WordPress** website which retrieves University Of Pisa graduands' grades and wraps them up in a PDF file along with some statistics and a final grade simulation

item.title: Chesspuzzles
item.description: **Java 11** **Spring** application which wraps [chess.com's puzzle api](https://www.chess.com/news/view/published-data-api) for a **JavaFX** client

item.title: Codfish 2000
item.description: **Javascript** chess engine written from scratch, with a nice ui and a simple **PHP**-**MySQL** back-end

item.title: SmartBuildings
item.description: **MySQL** database which stores buildings equipped with sensors and provides data analytics functions such as damage estimates following earthquakes

item.title: Radioactive Decay
item.description: **High school graduation assignment** concerning **physics**, **maths** (differential equation of radioactive decay) and **sciences** (Carbon-14 dating & the Chernobyl accident)
